name: dgenies
description: Dot plot large genomes in an interactive, efficient and simple way

scripts.minify:dgenies: cd src/dgenies/static/js/ && babel -o dgenies.min.js --compact --minified dgenies.js dgenies.prototypes.js
scripts.minify:dgenies:result: cd src/dgenies/static/js/ && babel -o dgenies.result.min.js --compact --minified dgenies.result.js dgenies.result.controls.js dgenies.result.export.js dgenies.result.summary.js d3.dgenies.js d3.dgenies.events.js d3.dgenies.mousetip.js d3.dgenies.zoom.js
scripts.minify:jquery:fileupload: cd src/dgenies/static/js/ && babel -o jquery.fileupload.min.js --compact --minified jquery.fileupload.js jquery.fileupload-process.js jquery.fileupload-validate.js
scripts.minify:dgenies:offline: cd src/dgenies/static/js/ && babel -o dgenies-offline-result.min.js --compact --minified jquery-3.2.1.min.js popper.min.js bootstrap.min.js bootstrap-notify.min.js jquery-ui.min.js jquery.cookie-1.4.1.min.js dgenies.min.js chosen.jquery.min.js FileSaver.min.js canvg.min.js d3.min.js dgenies.result.min.js BootstrapMenu.min.js
scripts.minify:js: npm run minify:dgenies && npm run minify:dgenies:result && npm run minify:jquery:fileupload && npm run minify:dgenies:run && npm run minify:dgenies:status && npm run minify:dgenies:doc && npm run minify:dgenies:offline
